page.title: 16SECONDARY SCHOOLS
page.content: In September this year 60 pupils will leave to go to their chosen secondary schools. As there is no official secondary school for this area the children have an{unusually wide {choice. This year 33 children are going to Shenfield Comprehensive, 10 to Brentwood County High, 12 to Hedley Walter Brentwood, all with in a six mile radius. 1 to St Martin's Comprehensive, Hutton, 1 to Colchester Grammar. The children travel to their schools by school buses. {The school year}is divided into three terms of about 16 weeks, 12 weeks and 14 weeks, with holidays at Christmas and Easter of 2 weeks and 6 weeks in the Summer. In addition there is a half term break of 1 week each term.
